name: James Harden
description: 6'5" left-handed shooting guard, known for his step-back jumper, beard, and playmaking ability.

step-back.name: The Step-Back
step-back.description: Creating space with his signature move for a three-pointer.
step-back.expression: focused intensity, eyes locked on the basket
step-back.prompt: James Harden executing his signature step-back jumper - ball held high, body leaning back creating separation, left hand guiding the ball, right leg extended for balance, defender trailing behind, focused gaze at the rim, determined expression

beard-stroke.name: Beard Stroke
beard-stroke.description: Thinking, planning the next play, stroking the beard.
beard-stroke.prompt: James Harden thoughtfully stroking his beard - standing near the free throw line, looking towards the coach or the court, right hand gently stroking his iconic beard, a slight smirk playing on his lips, sweat glistening on his forehead, deep in thought, strategic mastermind

cooking-stir.name: The Cooking Stir
cooking-stir.description: Stirring the pot celebration after a big play.
cooking-stir.prompt: James Harden performing the 'stir the pot' celebration - both hands miming stirring a pot, a wide grin on his face, body swaying slightly, teammates cheering in the background, confident swagger, a playful taunt directed at the opposing team, charismatic showmanship

lefty-layup.name: Lefty Layup
lefty-layup.description: Driving to the basket for a smooth left-handed finish.
lefty-layup.prompt: James Harden driving to the basket for a left-handed layup - ball secured in his left hand, body leaning slightly, right leg extended for balance, defender trailing, eyes focused on the rim, agile movement, a smooth finish at the basket, effortless agility

free-throw-ritual.name: Free Throw Ritual
free-throw-ritual.description: Preparing to shoot a free throw with his signature routine.
free-throw-ritual.prompt: James Harden at the free-throw line performing his pre-shot ritual - ball spinning in his hands, taking a deep breath, bouncing the ball a few times, eyes locked on the basket, unwavering focus, beads of sweat on his brow, intense concentration before the shot
